name: DESTRUCTODON
description:
Homo sapiens have outgrown their use

______________________________________

Some tips

-Hold [Left Mouse] to move/crush/eat. The further the cursor from Destructodon, the faster she will move.

-[Right Click] is ROAR! Pressing the on-screen button is an alternative for one-button mice.

-Eat 10 people to restore your health. Level up your 5 skills with XP.

-Cities are created differently each game.

-There is no end game in this early build. It is experimental and likely to change

SUPPORT THIS GAME if you'd like to see a full version

Dirigo Games
